name: Marble Combat
description: Marble combat is a physics based multiplayer game for 2 - 8 people. Players compete as magical marbles racing and fighting to dominate capture points and collect power ups.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: Online experience is subject to change based on your connection
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K/AMD FX-8350 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon R9 270X DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: Online experience is subject to change based on your connection
